article.title: Scientific Research Corporation to Provide C4ISR Support for Navy
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Scientific Research Corporation is being awarded a $6.5 million modification to a previously awarded indefinite delivery/indefinite quantity, cost-plus-fixed-fee, performance-based contract to provide services for systems engineering, software integration, configuration management, test, fleet introduction, product improvement, quality assurance and life-cycle management support of various command, control, communications, computers, intelligence, reconnaissance and surveillance (C4ISR) requirements, programs and projects.
